A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The worst SW movie of the bunch.  What they did to Luke Skywalkers character is shameful.  One of the iconic hero's of cinema reduced to a weak\, triggered\, emo-jedi in need of an entire planet as a safe-space.  The did you wrong Marc\, they did you wrong...

There was little character development overall-Finn and Rose story arc was superfluous\, Rey story arc is a hot mess (parents? powers?)\, all Kylo does is whinge\, Poe is an idiot.  These characters are becoming unlikable(they did not start at that way)

Movie got a too little political/preachy for my tastes-if came of as dross and clique.

Franchise truly jumped the shark with that Leia flying through space garbage-just horrible.

I guess Chewy 3PO and R2 get killed off in VIIII?  I won't be watching...
